languages.text: "То, что Вольный Торговец решил{mf||а} взять что-то себе не означает, что я не отчитаюсь о потерях перед маршалом. Хочешь видеть свое имя в отчете отдельной строкой?"
languages.translation_comment:
The Rogue Trader picks up a piece of loot on Leethus.
Jae: "Whatever is the matter, Proctor? Could it be that the Rogue Trader's presence allows for some relaxation of the Lex Imperialis?"

languages.text: "That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"
languages.translation_comment:
The Rogue Trader picks up a piece of loot on Leethus.
Jae: "Whatever is the matter, Proctor? Could it be that the Rogue Trader's presence allows for some relaxation of the Lex Imperialis?"
languages.original_text: "То, что Вольный Торговец решил{mf||а} взять что-то себе не означает, что я не отчитаюсь о потерях перед маршалом. Хочешь видеть свое имя в отчете отдельной строкой?"

traits.locale_text: "That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"
"That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

"That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

"That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

"That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

"That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーが自分のために何かを取ることを決めたからって、俺がその損失を将帥に報告しないわけじゃない。報告書の別の行にお前の名前も載せたいのか？」
languages.original_text: "That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーが自分のために何かを取ることを決めたからって、俺がその損失を将帥に報告しないわけじゃない。報告書の別の行にお前の名前も載せたいのか？」

languages.text: "Dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} etwas für sich behalten hat, bedeutet nicht, dass ich den Verlust dem Marschall nicht melden werde. Wollt Ihr Euren Namen auch in dem Bericht sehen – in eine separaten Zeile?"
languages.original_text: "That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

traits.locale_text: "Dass {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} etwas für sich behalten hat, bedeutet nicht, dass ich den Verlust dem Marschall nicht melden werde. Wollt Ihr Euren Namen auch in dem Bericht sehen – in eine separaten Zeile?"

languages.text: «El que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente haya decidido quedarse algo no significa que no vaya a informar de la pérdida al Mariscal. ¿Es que quiere que añada su nombre al informe en una fila aparte?».
languages.original_text: "That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

traits.locale_text: «El que {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente haya decidido quedarse algo no significa que no vaya a informar de la pérdida al Mariscal. ¿Es que quiere que añada su nombre al informe en una fila aparte?».

languages.text: “行商浪人打算私自带走一部分东西，但这并不意味着我不会把这些事情向元帅本人汇报。莫非，你也想在那份报告上看到你自己的名字吗？我会另起一行。”
languages.original_text: "That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人打算私自带走一部分东西，但这并不意味着我不会把这些事情向元帅本人汇报。莫非，你也想在那份报告上看到你自己的名字吗？我会另起一行。”

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'in bir şeyleri kendisi için almış olması, bu kaybı Miralay'a bildirmeyeceğim anlamına gelmez. Raporda kendi adını da görmek ister misin? Hem de ayrı bir satırda?"
languages.original_text: "That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'in bir şeyleri kendisi için almış olması, bu kaybı Miralay'a bildirmeyeceğim anlamına gelmez. Raporda kendi adını da görmek ister misin? Hem de ayrı bir satırda?"

languages.original_text: "That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

languages.text: « Ce n'est pas parce que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a décidé de s'approprier quelque chose que je ne signalerai pas la perte au maréchal. Voulez-vous que votre nom apparaisse également dans mon rapport, sur une ligne bien à part ? »
languages.original_text: "That the Rogue Trader has decided to take something for {mf|himself|herself} does not mean I won't report the loss to the Marshal. Do you want to see your name in the report as well — in a separate row?"

traits.locale_text: « Ce n'est pas parce que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a décidé de s'approprier quelque chose que je ne signalerai pas la perte au maréchal. Voulez-vous que votre nom apparaisse également dans mon rapport, sur une ligne bien à part ? »
